entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
